# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 3.6.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 3.5.x   | :x:                |
| 3.4.x   | :x:                |
| 2.x     | :x:                |
| 1.x     | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Write an email to office@foodcoopshop.com
